div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1705 Tebtunis (mod. Umm el Buregat), (1075) 25 km. SSW of El Fayoum, 1900 Burial: mid 2nd cent. B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 107 AE. From excavation of temple site Ptolemy IV?: 1 (Cyrenaic, as Svoronos 1158) Ptolemy V: 2 (as Sv. 1237) Ptolemy VI: 104 (as Sv. 1426-7) Disposition: University of California (Mu- seum of Anthropology) Milne, JEA 1935, pp. 211-2
